properties.title: Launch analysis on Amazon Web service cloud
properties.author: Laurent Jourdren

section.name: Launch analysis on Amazon Web service cloud
section.p: This command launch Eoulsan on Amazon Web Services Cloud. The data is first upload on Amazon S3 storage before running analysis is started. To run Eoulsan on AWS, you must set the AWS credentials in global parameters of your parameter file or in a configuration file.

ul.li:
Mandatory parameters:
ParameterValueDescription
parameter pathstringThe path to parameter file to use
design pathstringThe path design file to use
data path on S3stringThe path where to upload data on S3

Optional parameters:
ParameterValueDescription
-dstringThe description of the analysis. This description will be used as AWS MapReduce job name.

Usage:
$ eoulsan.sh awsexec -d 'My Eoulsan test' param.xml design.txt s3://my-bucket/test
